code: import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/styles';var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{box:{position:'fixed',backgroundColor:'black',zIndex:'999',width:'100%',height:'100%',display:'grid',alignItems:'center',transition:'0.3s ease-in-out',opacity:'100%',top:'0'},unbox:{position:'fixed',backgroundColor:'black',zIndex:'999',width:'100%',height:'100%',display:'grid',alignItems:'center',transition:'0.3s ease-in-out',opacity:'0',top:'-100%'},close:{color:'#fff',fontSize:'2rem','&:hover':{color:'green'}},iconbutton:{position:'absolute',top:'0.6rem',right:'1.5rem'},list:{color:'#fff'},listitem:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',cursor:'pointer','&:hover':{color:'green'}},button:{fontSize:'1rem',transition:'all 0.3s ease-in-out',border:'1px solid #fff','&:hover':{backgroundColor:'#222',color:'#fff',transition:'all 0.3s ease-in-out',border:'1px solid #fff'}}};});export default useStyles;
